citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 6:00 on
06/30/2015.
Upon arrival I called the phone number listed and waited 30 min. Please contact me with your current hours of
operation.
This is the first attempted inspection.
